Description: * Fixed a bug with falloff calculation that was often causing {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=guns}} to do much more damage than intended. We'll be monitoring to do subsequent adjustments after this.
* Hero kill bounty split efficiency for 1/2/3/4/5/6 players changed from 100/100/90/84/65/72% to 100/100/85/70/55/50%
* {{PageRef|Guardian}}s armor decay peak at 12m instead of 10m
* Fixed {{PageRef|Base {{PageRef|Guardian}}}}s HP not matching Lane {{PageRef|Guardian}}s (were 1000 less)
* {{PageRef|Trophy Collector}}: {{PageRef|Souls}} per minute reduced from 30 to 22
* {{PageRef|Trophy Collector}}: Health per stack reduced from 25 to 20
* {{PageRef|Focus Lens}}: Cooldown increased from 25s to 32s ({{PageRef|Spirit Sap}} now matches this too)
